title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       For your safety:   Watch your step on uneven surfaces. Do not leave valuables in your car. In an emergency, call 911.  To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulations.  Dogs are welcome in all Metroparks, except Toledo Botanical Garden. Dogs must be on leashes at all times. Parking is permitted in designated spaces only. Parking is not permitted on the grass. Walking trails are for pedestrian use only. Bicycles and rollerblades are permitted on all-purpose trails, unless otherwise indicated. Â·
